title: Apex's Lesson: Let's Be Better - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.20.19
description:
Andrea and Greg talk about how devs, gamers, and everyone else have to re-learn how to talk to each other. 

Time Stamps - 
00:03:15 - Housekeeping
PAX is next week! Guild Wars event Friday morning, KFGShowcase Friday at 4:30, Inter-Site Championship Saturday at 9! kindafunny.com/events
The Roper Report   -
00:05:22 - Respawn CEO Vince Zampella on the Apex/Reddit Explosion
00:19:56 - “Are developers really supposed to just roll over and take it from some of the more vitriolic members of the gaming community?” - The Virtual Boy
00:26:15 - Shawn Layden on Insomniac Purchase
00:32:02 - Shawn on PS4 Exclusives on PC
00:33:30 - Hotline Miami was in Australia for a hot sec
00:34:23 - 2D Sonic and Mario Go to the Olympics
00:36:14 - Out today
00:39:06 - Imran Khan
00:40:31 -  WHCF & PM
Reader mail   -
00:42:45 - “When are we going to see Nintendo reciprocate?” - instagram.com/wondercreme Please Follow
00:44:26 - “I recently got an oculus quest and was a bit disappointed by how much better it is from a technical standpoint than my PSVR headset…” - Parker Petrov
00:50:36 - Squad Up: Zack - PS4 - SONofTHOMP8264
00:51:35 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Whitta
